item.title: Midnight Mass, 2021 - ★★★★½
item.description: Mike Flanagan is becoming the new(?) expert at long form horror. Took a couple episodes to get in to this, but starting around episode 3 I was hooked. One of the best long-form/emo/splatter horror mini-series I've seen...excited for what's next!
item.dc:creator: Drew Stinnett

item.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings, 2021 - ★★★★
item.letterboxd:filmTitle: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
item.dc:creator: Drew Stinnett

item.title: Lifeforce, 1985 - ★★★★
item.description: Don't have many regrets in life, but one of the big ones is that I had Nancy Paul as an acting teacher in college, but didn't appreciate the fact that she was a stand-out in a Tobe Hooper classic at the time
item.dc:creator: Drew Stinnett
